title: Field of Sterile Compounding
text:
- Don't kill anyone
- Mix things like you are mixing for your friends and family

title: Field of pharmacy management
text:
- Each employee can call for a holiday off, however it is first come first serve.
- Everyone must not be late as timing is crucial. 
- Run times are @ 0230, 0500, 0930, 1330, 1700, and 2130.
